summary: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.
cast: Leon Lai|Michelle Reis|Takeshi Kaneshiro|Charlie Yeung|Karen Mok|Fai-Hung Chan|Man-Lei Chan|Toru Saito|To-Hoi Kong|Lee-Na Kwan|Yuhao Wu
title: Fallen Angels (Ángeles caídos)
